name: Minimalism (itch) (Bartilein)
description:
You are a lonely triangle trying to survive by destroying all spheres which are protected by cubes. Even resting is damaging you so keep moving and destroy the spheres.

Movement: 
Left Mouse Button: Move to cursor
Right Mouse Button: Speed Booster
"R" Key: Restart Game (If any bugs happen making game unplayble)
"Esc" Key: Quit Game 

Have Fun!
